data.title: 2019 Voting for Best of Cincinnati Awards from CityBeat Magazine is Now Open!
data.meta_description: Ohio Valley Goodwill is delighted to share the news that 2019 Voting is Now Open for the Best of Cincinnati poll from CityBeat Magazine! The great news is that CityBeat has made it easier than ever to vote for your favorites in a variety of categories – everything from restaurants to shopping. The even more […]
data.text:
Ohio Valley Goodwill is delighted to share the news that 2019 Voting is Now Open for the Best of Cincinnati poll from CityBeat Magazine! The great news is that CityBeat has made it easier than ever to vote for your favorites in a variety of categories – everything from restaurants to shopping. The even more exciting news is that you can Vote FOR Goodwill in the category of Thrift Shop under “Shopping and Services.” You must vote in at least 20 categories for your vote to count and you can vote once per day. Voting continues until February 6th at 12 pm. Please VOTE for Goodwill as Best of Cincinnati 2019 in the category of “Thrift Shop!” We would LOVE your vote and of course, we LOVE our wonderful shoppers and donors. https://www.citybeat.com/best-of-cincinnati-2019-readers-choice-poll#// Please VOTE for Goodwill Today and every day until February 6th. Remember, you must vote in 20 categories for your vote to count.

To get started, enter your name, email address and zip code in the Voter Registration area. The ballot is pre-populated with top vote-getters from last year and Goodwill is grateful to always be included in the CityBeat “Best of Cincinnati” poll in the Thrift Shop category. Thank you for your support! For 100+ years, you’ve helped Goodwill to put people to work in our community and to be a leader in environmental stewardship. Please VOTE Today!

Please Vote for Goodwill at
